definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Article 6 The Ministry of Public Security is in charge of the nationwide safety protection work of computer information systems.
sentences.chinese: 第六條公安部主管全國計算機信息系統安全保護工作。

sentences.english: Detailed measures shall be stipulated separately by the Ministry of Public Security.
sentences.chinese: 具體辦法由公安部另行規定。

sentences.english: Li Chang worried most about his wife who was also working in the Ministry of Public Security.
sentences.chinese: 李昌說，他那時最擔心的，是同在公安部工作的老伴。

sentences.english: Is this the same case released by the Ministry of Public Security today?
sentences.chinese: 今天公安部公佈的是同一起案件嗎？

sentences.english: Why do (or do not) public security authorities engage in the innovative bandwagon of microblogging?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼公安部門會捲入政務微博的時尚浪潮？

sentences.english: By comparison, the head of the Ministry of Public Security is a member.
sentences.chinese: 與此相比，中國的公安部部長卻是中央政治局委員。

sentences.english: Third, examine the safety inspection certificate issued by public security organs.
sentences.chinese: 三查是否有公安部門的安全檢測合格證書。

sentences.english: A Shanghai police spokeswoman declared she was unaware about the notice’s existence.
sentences.chinese: 一位上海公安部發言人聲稱她從未看到過這份文件。

sentences.english: The specific measures shall be formulated by the public security institution under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 具體辦法由國務院公安部門規定。

sentences.english: Police chief urges tough hand on thugs in riots.
sentences.chinese: 公安部部長要求嚴厲懲治新疆騷亂暴徒。

sentences.english: Article 7 The department of public security under the State Council shall be responsible for administration of public security throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第七條國務院公安部門負責全國的治安管理工作。

sentences.english: Certainly is Li Meng's vice minister that public security official's part takes care of national place hall work in the bureau.
sentences.chinese: 當然是公安部分管全國地方廳局工作的李盟副部長啦。

sentences.english: The Chinese Ministry of Public Security also signed a range of cooperation documents with US departments concerned.
sentences.chinese: 中國公安部與美有關部門還簽署了一系列合作文件。

sentences.english: State Councilor and Minister of Public Security Meng Jianzhu presided over the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員兼公安部部長孟建柱主持了典禮。

sentences.english: Qi said the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and the Ministry of Public Security have joined in consulting regarding the dispute.
sentences.chinese: 齊向東表示，工信部和公安部已經介入這一紛爭。

sentences.english: Public Security Minister Meng Jianzhu, China's top policeman, called for an investigation into the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 公安部部長孟建柱，要求詳細調查火災的原因。

definition: Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4

definition: public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
Ministry of Civil Affairs (MCA) of the PRC
Ministry of Land and Resources (MLR), formed in 1998
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
